trans-unit.source: Direct access to DSC resource methods
trans-unit.target: Direct access to DSC resource methods

trans-unit.source: The [Invoke-DscResource](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt517869.aspx) cmdlet has been added to allow direct access to DSC resources and their methods (Get, Set or Test).
trans-unit.target: The [Invoke-DscResource](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt517869.aspx) cmdlet has been added to allow direct access to DSC resources and their methods (Get, Set or Test).

trans-unit.source: It can be used by third-parties that want to take advantage of DSC resources.
trans-unit.target: It can be used by third-parties that want to take advantage of DSC resources.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Calling DSC resource methods directly](https://msdn.microsoft.com/powershell/dsc/directcallresource).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Calling DSC resource methods directly](https://msdn.microsoft.com/powershell/dsc/directcallresource).
